name: Fix-It!
description:
Fix it! Help us repair our crumbling world one tiny bandage at a time! Precisely place your helpful little boo-boo buster on a myriad of broken objects that just might become increasingly more difficult to control. Race against the timer to fix anything and everything, before you face the consequences... 

Credits:

Arthur Luo: Producer, Designer

Nick Burt: Programmer

Maxwell Brady: Sound Designer

Anna Marcus: Producer, Artist
